name: Multi Theft Auto
description: Want to roleplay? We provide a powerful user interface system that makes otherwise complex tasks easy. Want to drive like a maniac? We've got a brilliant Race mode that lets you race hundreds of tracks around San Andreas. Want to sneak up on people in the dark and murder them? See a psychologist - or play our ever-popular Stealth mode. Want something else nobody else has thought of? Make it with our easy scripting system or map editor
